pages.text: Catmint is... Wow... Er-. This smells too good, it feels as if it was going to make me levitate... $(br2)Anyway! Catmint leaves are gathered from the Catmint plant. These are the tastiest of herbs, be careful not to like them too much! Catmint is swallowed and is known as the most effective healing herb for certain diseases.$(br)
pages.title: Catmint
